name: stigmatization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of treating someone or something unfairly by publicly disapproving of them: Care needs to be taken to ensure there is no stigmatization of children based on their home circumstances. She kept her medical condition a secret for fear of stigmatization and discrimination. See
stigmatize

For him, the stigmatization of homosexuality at the time gave way to an intense self-loathing.I didn't face parental disapproval or stigmatization of any kind.
